explains: n. 推理，推论；推断力，逻辑推理能力
v. 推理，逻辑思考；推论出，推断出（reason sth. out）；对（某人）以理相劝，劝告（reason with）（reason 的现在分词）
wordGroup: inductive reasoning 归纳推理；归纳法
moral reasoning 道德推理；道德理性
deductive reasoning 演绎推理，演绎推论；演绎法

sentences.en: I don't follow your line of reasoning.
sentences.cn: 我不理解你的推理方法。

sentences.en: Their reasoning was based on a set of unstated assumptions.
sentences.cn: 他们的推理是以一系列未说明的假定为基础的。

sentences.en: The test has scores for verbal skills, mathematical skills, and abstract reasoning skills.
sentences.cn: 该项测试对文字表达技能、数学技能和抽象推理技能进行记分。
